name: Creamy Chicken and Broccoli Orzo
steps: Cut broccoli into florets and peel stems. Roughly chop into small pieces and set aside.
Fill pot with water and salt generously. Bring to a boil and add orzo. Add broccoli in last 5 minutes.
While orzo cooks, heat butter in a large skillet and add chicken once hot. Cook until golden brown and cooked through.
Mince garlic and cook with chicken until golden, 30 seconds to 1 minute.
Once orzo is cooked, drain and add to chicken, stirring in milk and Parmesan cheese. Add salt and pepper to taste.
Top with more parmesan if desired.
